summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.6°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3175 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 10789 lux), cloud levels (up 1539 m), feels like temperature (up 4.5°C), and outside temperature (up 3.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 67.8m lower than yesterday, 924.4m lower than past week, 1539.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1197.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
